class.name: GridMapEditorPlugin
class.description: GridMapEditorPlugin provides access to the [GridMap] editor functionality.

method.name: get_current_grid_map
method.description: Returns the [GridMap] node currently edited by the grid map editor.

method.name: get_selected_cells
method.description: Returns an array of [Vector3i]s with the selected cells' coordinates.

method.name: get_selected_palette_item
method.description: Returns the index of the selected [MeshLibrary] item in the grid map editor's palette or [code]-1[/code] if no item is selected. [b]Note:[/b] The indices might not be in the same order as they appear in the editor's interface.

method.name: get_selection
method.description: Returns the cell coordinate bounds of the current selection. Use [method has_selection] to check if there is an active selection.

method.name: has_selection
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if there are selected cells.

method.name: set_selected_palette_item
method.description: Selects the [MeshLibrary] item with the given index in the grid map editor's palette. If a negative index is given, no item will be selected. If a value greater than the last index is given, the last item will be selected. [b]Note:[/b] The indices might not be in the same order as they appear in the editor's interface.

method.name: set_selection
method.description: Selects the cells inside the given bounds from [param begin] to [param end].
